Sentencas: Fabrication of dense Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC) thin-film electrolytes by wet powder spraying in combination with high-temperature sintering is investigated.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: Two powder synthesis techniques, i.e., a hydrothermal synthesis and an EDTA-citrate complexing sol-gel process, were investigated.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction, BET surface area and laser particle size analysis demonstrate there is certain level of aggregation in both powders.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: However, it is more pronounced in powders obtained by the complexing process, and only the colloidal suspensions of powders prepared by hydrothermal synthesis are stable.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: SEM analysis of the green and sintered thin-film electrolytes demonstrate that the SDC electrolyte with powders prepared via the hydrothermal synthesis is denser.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: By optimizing the fabrication conditions, dense SDC electrolytes with a thickness of similar to 12 mu m are successfully fabricated.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: The cells with SDC prepared from hydrothermal synthesis demonstrate open circuit voltages and power outputs similar to those of similar cells fabricated from other advanced techniques.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques

Sentencas: Because of its simplicity and flexibility for anode substrate geometric shape, it turns out to be a promising technology to fabricate thin-film SDC electrolyte for solid-oxide fuel cell application.
Titulo: Comparative study of doped ceria thin-film electrolytes prepared by wet powder spraying with powder synthesized via two techniques
